title: PM’s Clean & Green Pakistan campaign turned into a movement :Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 09 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib Monday said the Clean and Green campaign of Prime Minister Imran Khan turned into a movement as the entire nation has started planting trees across the country.
وزیراعظم عمران خان کی کلین اینڈ گرین پاکستان مہم ایک تحریک کی شکل اختیار کرگئی ہے پوری پاکستانی قوم ماحولیاتی تبدیلی کے برے اثرات سے بچنے کے لئے درخت لگا کر اپنی قومی ذمہ داری پوری کررہی ہے۔PHA لاہور نے  سب سے بڑا میواکی اربن فاریسٹ لگایا ہے
#CleanGreenPunjab pic.twitter.com/q2gGHo9E0l
— Farrukh Habib (@FarrukhHabibISF) August 9, 2021
In a tweet, he said the people of Pakistan were fulfilling their national responsibility by enthusiastically participating in the drive to reduce environmental impacts in the country.
The Parks and Horticulture Authority (PHA) Lahore has made a history by launching the world’s biggest Miyawaki forest near Saggian, he added.
